subject: JUnit 4.1 fails AllTests with 2 errors
msgSnippet: I m trying to get started with JUnit 4.1. After installing JUnit, I typed the recommended command: java org.junit.runner.JUnitCore org.junit.tests.AllTests
messageBody:
I'm trying to get started with JUnit 4.1. After installing JUnit, I
typed the recommended command:

"java org.junit.runner.JUnitCore org.junit.tests.AllTests"

The instructions say that this should result in an "OK" message. I'm
getting this result:

FAILURES!!!
Tests run: 261, Failures: 2

I'm including the exception stack below.

Java is running on Windows XP,
java version "1.5.0_07"
Java(TM) 2 Runtime Environment, Standard Edition (build 1.5.0_07-b03)
Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (build 1.5.0_07-b03, mixed mode, sharing)

What am I overlooking?

RK Henry

------------------------
